TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigMapPath

Docs.summary: Provides access to the mapping between configuration-file virtual and physical paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IConfigMapPath is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAppPathForPath (string siteID, string path);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAppPathForPath(string siteID, string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL associated with the site.
Docs.summary: Gets the virtual-directory name associated with a specific site.
Docs.returns: The must be unique. No two sites share the same id. The distinguishes sites that have the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetAppPathForPath is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetDefaultSiteNameAndID (out string siteName, out string siteID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetDefaultSiteNameAndID(string siteName, string siteID) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
Docs.summary: Populates the default site name and the site ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetDefaultSiteNameAndID is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetMachineConfigFilename() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetMachineConfigFilename is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetPathConfigFilename (string siteID, string path, out string directory, out string baseName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetPathConfigFilename(string siteID, string path, string directory, string baseName) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL associated with the site.
The physical directory of the configuration path.
The name of the configuration file.
Docs.summary: Populates the directory and name of the configuration file based on the site ID and site path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetPathConfigFilename is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetRootWebConfigFilename() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the configuration file at the Web root.
Docs.returns: The name of the configuration file at the Web root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetRootWebConfigFilename is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public string MapPath (string siteID, string path);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string MapPath(string siteID, string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL associated with the site.
Docs.summary: Gets the physical directory path based on the site ID and URL associated with the site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MapPath is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveSiteArgument (string siteArgument, out string siteName, out string siteID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveSiteArgument(string siteArgument, string siteName, string siteID) cil managed

Docs.param: The site name or site identifier.
A unique identifier for the site.
Docs.summary: Populates the site name and site ID based on a site argument value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If `siteArgument` is `null`, is equal to the default site name, or is equal to the default site identifier, the `siteName` and `siteID` are populated with the default site values.
ResolveSiteArgument is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
